name: Lonatharil
aura: Increases Ally HP in Doom Tower Battles by 35%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Decreases the target’s MAX HP by 30% of the damage inflicted. Places a [Shield] buff equal to 10% of this Champion’s MAX HP for 2 turns on the ally with the lowest HP.
skills.name: Gallantry
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Damage +5%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 3 turns equal to 20% of this Champion's MAX HP. 

If there are any dead allies, places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 3 turns equal to 30% of this Champion’s MAX HP instead. This buff cannot be removed, stolen, transferred, spread, or have its duration increased or decreased by enemies or allies.
skills.name: Flicker Barrier
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Cooldown -1
Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Places a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on all allies for 2 turns, then teams up with all allies to attack a single enemy.
skills.name: Finest Hour

skills.desc: Inflicts 20% more damage against targets under [Shield] buffs.
skills.name: Piercer [P]
